title: Patty's Charcoal Drive-in - conveys sense of time

content.prompt: Which of the following lines best conveys the speaker’s sense of time while at the drive-in?

choices.label: “And I wait on them, hoping for tips” (line 19)

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
